de.ovgu.featureide.fm.core.base.impl

Class ModelFileIdMap

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.ovgu.featureide.fm.core.base.impl.ModelFileIdMap

  • public class ModelFileIdMap
extends java.lang.Object
    This is a helper class to realize unique numeric identifiers for feature models in respect to the models physical file. Each feature model is required to be assigned to an unique identifier. This unique identifier is coupled to the model file, such that the file path determines the feature models identifier.
    Author:
    Sebastian Krieter, Marcus Pinnecke (Feature Interface)
    See Also:
    IFeatureModel#setSourceFile(File), FeatureModel#setSourceFile(File)

    • Method Detail

      • getModelId

        public static long getModelId(IFeatureModel featureModel,
                              java.nio.file.Path modelFile)
        Returns the feature models unique numeric identifier which is determined by the feature models physical file. A call to this method returns the id associated with modelFile if the model identifier was already associated to this file name. Otherwise, the featureModel's identifier is returned and associated to modelFile for further usage.

        Note: There is no check if featureModel.getId() is unequal to the identifier associated with modelFile, i.e., if there is already an identifier associated with modelFile which is unequal to featureModel's model identifier, modelFile' identifier is returned.
        Parameters:
        featureModel - The feature model (might be null, if modelFile is associated to an identifier already)
        modelFile - The key value for association of feature model unique numeric identifiers. Is intended to point to the feature models underlying model (have to be non-null) physical file
        Returns:
        The identifier associated with modelFile if there is already such an association. featureModel's identifier otherwise.
